text: The warning issued yesterday (7th Sept.) at 3.00 p.m. is effective for the next 24 hours.NBRO requests civilians in these areas to be extra vigilant and ready to evacuate to a safe location if rains continue.National Building Research Organization (NBRO) due to the rainfall within the past 24 hours, which exceeded 100 mm, has issued landslide warning for Ratnapura, Galle, Kegalle, Nuwara Eliya and Kalutara Districts. The warning issued yesterday (7th Sept.) at 3.00 p.m. is effective for the next 24 hours.NBRO requests civilians in these areas to be extra vigilant and ready to evacuate to a safe location if rains continue.
title: Landslide warning for five districts
